gui.guilinegraph



class GUILineGraph: gui.guielement.GUIElement;
Line graph widget, showing multiple changing values, each in its own graph system monitor style.

void data_point_time(real time);
Set time between two graph data points.

real data_point_time();
Return time between two graph data points.

void toggle_value(string value);
Toggle visibility of graph of specified value.

void auto_scale(bool scale);
If true, Y axis of the graph will be scaled automatically according to highest value.

void auto_scroll(bool scroll);
If true, graph will automatically scroll to show newest data.

void time_offset(float offset);
Set time offset of the graph. Used for manual scrolling.

void scroll(float offset);
Manually scrolls the graph horizontally.

void scale_x(float scale_x);
Set X scale of the graph. Used for manual zooming.

void scale_y(float scale_y);
Set Y scale of the graph. Used for manual zooming.

float time_offset();
Get time offset of the graph.

float scale_x();
Get X scale of the graph.

float scale_y();
Get Y scale of the graph.

void font_size(uint size);
Set font size of this graph.

void die();
Destroy this GUILineGraph.

this(GUIElementParams params, Color[char[]] colors, GraphData data);
Construct a GUILineGraph with specified parameters.

Params:
GUIElementParams params Parameters for GUIElement constructor.
Color[char[]] colors Colors of graphs of measured values.
GraphData data GraphData to display.

class GUILineGraphFactory: gui.guielement.GUIElementFactoryBase!(GUILineGraph).GUIElementFactoryBase;
Factory used for line graph construction.

See Also:
GUIElementFactoryBase

Params:
data Graph data to display. Must be specified.
graph_color Set color for graph of measured value with specified name.

GUILineGraph produce();
Produce a GUILineGraph with parameters of the factory.
